sentences.english: The Sukhoi SU-22 is a robust and effective Soviet built ground attack aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 蘇22是前蘇聯建造的一種威力強大的對地攻擊戰機。

sentences.english: Experience of Zhao shake day arrived the might of landmine, be determined learns to make thunder technology secretly.
sentences.chinese: 趙震天見識到了地雷的威力，決意偷學造雷技術。

sentences.english: A pale gleam of tempered sunlight fell through the leaves.
sentences.chinese: 威力減弱的暗淡陽光從樹葉間灑下來。

sentences.chinese: 威力巴流量計在湘鋼檢測系統的應用。

sentences.english: You should never underestimate the power of a good domain name.
sentences.chinese: 你永遠都不能低估一個好域名的威力。

sentences.english: The trees were bending before the storm.
sentences.chinese: 在暴風雨的威力下樹被吹彎了。

sentences.english: And we can't count on military might alone.
sentences.chinese: 但是美國不能單靠我們的軍事威力。

sentences.english: Fire Thunder to play a maximum power of catching up after school kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 發揮上限的烈火雷霆學了後威力趕超菜刀。

sentences.english: Your Majesty, since my 'Evil Sword' is powerful.
sentences.chinese: 皇爺，就是因爲書生奪命劍威力太驚人。

sentences.english: The tremendous power of the explosion will be some of the passengers rushed to the wreckage of the vehicle body.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸產生的巨大威力將部分乘客屍體殘骸衝到車外。

sentences.english: It is immoral that a mattress should have so much power.
sentences.chinese: 這很不象話，一個牀墊有這麼大的威力。

sentences.english: The President Richard Nixon's crumpling up has illustrated the power of the media lively.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松總統的垮臺，形象地說明了新聞報道的威力。

sentences.english: Experts have celebrated the power of brainstorming and idea-generation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 專家們爲腦力激盪和創意產生機制的威力拍手叫好。

sentences.english: These light mounted missile troops have dismounted, yet they are still formidable warriors.
sentences.chinese: 弓騎兵即便步行作戰威力仍舊十分驚人。

sentences.english: This chapter dwells on the power of Lu Xun's essays.
sentences.chinese: 這一章詳細論述魯迅雜文的威力。

sentences.english: The sheer power of electronic commerce (e-commerce) will change the face of trade dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 電子商務的驚人威力會使貿易發生鉅變。

definition: individual soldier/(literary) isolated military unit, cut off from reinforcements
no stronghold one cannot overcome (idiom); to conquer every obstacle/nothing one can't do/to carry everything before one
